attributes.action: Examine URGENTLY and THOROUGHLY the current implementation, operation and maintenance of traffic lights; recognising that many unnecessarily cause delay, congestion, pollution and energy waste.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Increasing numbers of traffic lights are causing more problems than they solve. Many are unnecessary for quieter times, most are badly sequenced leading to costly delay. It is notable that that traffic generally moves freely when lights are out of action. Review of responsibilities for correct installation and maintenance urgently needed.
